I'm not familiar with the built-in 'health' feature... it confused me... but if you don't mind creating your own 'health/life/hp/whatever', I can help with that...

Game Book is much more limited than the Text Adventure, so a few things are done differently...

the Game Book only has two Objects you can add Attributes to:

player
and
game
